Name: Kick The Puppet
About the game: Want to let off steam? This game is made for you ! Knives, submachine gun, flamethrower, tank ... Which method will you choose? Kick The Puppet is a relaxing game where the goal is to gain maximum gold coins by hurting your doll. With these coins you can buy weapons doing more damage and therefore more gold coins. But you can also buy equipment to your doll so that it has flow! This doll makes fun of you ... Show him what you're worth! Features : ■ Different equipment! ■ Different types of weapons! ■ De-stressing and relaxing gameplay!
